channel.title: FLF - Leadership Now Podcast
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Getting Eldership Right (Part 2) [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
Aaron and Chris are back this week with the second half of our podcast on getting eldership right! In this episode Aaron covers the process of finding elders in the church, the capacities of an elder, and much more! 

More Resources:

We are excited to partner with the Fight Laugh Feast Network to reach more listeners. Download the app here: https://subsplash.com/fightlaughfeastnetwork/app

 

More resources at Dr. Aaron Rock’s blog: Pursuit of Glory https://pursuitofglory.org/
item.author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman
item.itunes:author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman

item.title: Critically Assessing the POEC Report [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
This week, Aaron breaks down the report put out by the Public Order Emergency Commission that analyses Justin Trudeau and the Government's decision to invoke the Emergencies Act against the Truckers Freedom Convoy in Ottawa last year.

More Resources:

We are excited to partner with the Fight Laugh Feast Network to reach more listeners. Download the app here: https://subsplash.com/fightlaughfeastnetwork/app

 

More resources at Dr. Aaron Rock’s blog: Pursuit of Glory https://pursuitofglory.org/
item.author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman
item.itunes:author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman

item.title: Getting Eldership Right (Part 1) [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this episode of Leadership Now with Dr. Aaron Rock, Aaron begins a 2-part podcast on all things eldership! What it is, its significance, and how to find the right elders for your church.

More Resources:

item.title: Being a Missionary-Minded Church [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this episode of Leadership Now with Dr. Aaron Rock, Aaron discusses keeping your church focused on leading people to Christ, despite the size of your church.

item.title: When Pigs Fly-The Absurdity of the Present [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this episode of Leadership Now with Dr. Aaron Rock, Aaron addresses the much of the senseless and preposterous ideologies that plague our culture, ways in which some may have never thought possible, and what our response as faithful believers should be.

 

More Resources:

We are excited to partner with the Fight Laugh Feast Network to reach more listeners. Download the app here: https://subsplash.com/fightlaughfeastnetwork/app

 

More resources at Dr. Aaron Rock’s blog: Pursuit of Glory https://pursuitofglory.org/
